item.title: the Eyes arrive for offred
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Offred System The final scene: She is taken away — either by Mayday_Agents rescuers or by the regime.

item.title: serena joy discovers offred’s betrayal
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Serena_Joy finds out about Nick → offred’s position becomes extremely dangerous.

item.title: ofglen kills herself
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Ofglen This signals how dangerous the situation has become, and that the regime is tightening control.

item.title: relationship with nick
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Offred Nick This completely shifts her life. For the first time she feels affection and hope.

item.title: visit jezebel’s
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point jezebel’s The_Commander takes Offred to the brothel. She meets Moira again and sees the reality of gilead’s corruption.

item.title: secret visits with commander
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point The_Commander Scrabble, gifts, attention — extremely dangerous. Offred begins taking small risks.

item.title: offred meets ofglen
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Ofglen Mayday_Agents This is the first time Offred realizes there is a resistance. She realizes she is not alone.

item.title: training at the red center
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point red_center Indoctrination, punishment, trauma. Moira’s escape here becomes a legendary act of defiance.

item.title: captured of Offred and seperation from luke and her daughter
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point Offred Luke Offreds_daughter A traumatic moment that defines her entire internal struggle.

item.title: the fall of the united states
item.description: Turning_Point Turning point System Women lose their rights (jobs, bank accounts, identity). This creates the world where Handmaids exist.
